template.description: While having a different structure, working with JSON in NiFi is very similar to working with CSV. There are, however, a few processors for dealing exclusively with JSON. In this section, you will build a flow similar to the CSV example – read a file, split it into rows, and write each row to a file – but you will perform some more modifications of the data within the pipeline so that the rows you write to disk are different than what was in the original file.
template.name: Working with JSON in NiFi
